text: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَٱسْتَبَقُوا۟ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see?
translation.id.indonesian: Dan jikalau Kami menghendaki pastilah Kami hapuskan penglihatan mata mereka; lalu mereka berlomba-lomba (mencari) jalan, Maka betapakah mereka dapat melihat(nya).
